price: 32.Yalli ibliisik : kee ibliisow maca litoo?Malaykâ luk Aadamah kummaata num kah akke waytam kaak iyye.
arabic: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبۡلِيسُ مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāib'līsu mā laka allā takūna maʿa al-sājidīna
